column2: Metal Quarry with Crusher Plant for Sale in Giriulla
column6: Metal quarry with crusher plant for sale Hamangalla, Giriulla, Kurnegala.The quarry site is located at Hamangalla, Giriulla in South boundary of North Western Province. It is 60 km from Colombo city. It is an ideal distance to supply quarry products to capital city and road developments projects.The Metal Quarry land is owned by single shareholder. It has 34 acres out of that, 27 acres are minable bed rock. The total content of entire land approximately 1,000,000 m3. The available rock area has been estimated to 306,692 m3. After using the rock area the land can be used for any other alternative use.Also it has large Coconut and teak plantation. Total of 1500 coconut trees and 700 Teak tress 700 which are in harvestable size. The average height and girth of a teak tree is 20ft and 42 inches respectively. The available timber content of a tree is 15 cubic feet. The average height of a coconut tree is 40ft. The company has following Licenses / Permits / Certificates / Approvals:	Industrial Mining License - A Category (IML-A) from Geological Survey & Mines Bureau	Environment Protections License (EPL) from the Provincial Environmental Authority - NWP	Trade Licenses – Metal Mining & Metal Crushing from Pannala, Pradesheeya	Explosive Permit from the Defence Ministry	Archaeology Clearance Certificate from Department of ArchaeologyThe plan and equipment consist of, Jaw Crusher 600cm X 900cm, Box Type Crusher / Impactor,  Material Feeder, Oscillating Screen, Material Oscillating Feeder, Machinery Equipment Cable, Conveyors (Big Chanel Steel & Big Angle Iron),  Power Supply Switch Panel,  Air Compressor with Air Reservoir Tank (Weight .2t ), Diameter 90 Drill (Weight 460kg), Hand Air leg Bi service, Rock Drill (50kg), 800KVA Transformer with National Grid Power Supply.Other immovable properties Office and Store Complex, Staff Quarters / Canteen / Kitchen Complex, Tool Room, Power Supply Switch Panel Room etc.The estimated market value of the quarry is 600 mn and balance land 47 mn total of 647 mn.Historic value of the land, plant and building and the licenses worth of LKR 375 Mn. The valuation report and feasibility study report available on request. Please contact us for more information.
